skills.name: Libation to Fire
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 25s] Attack enemies with Might of An-Utu, dealing 100% + 900%/1,600%/2,500% ATK of Fire DMG at 0/1/2 stack(s) of charge respectively. Lose 8% of current HP per second for 5s after using the weapon active (will not cause death). Cannot use the weapon active at below 10% HP. Initial charge starts at 1 stack; gain 1 stack when spending no less than 30 SP at a time.

skills.name: Solar Prominence
skills.description: The wielder gains 30.0% Total DMG Multiplier, and her weapon active inflicts 20.0% Fire Vulnerability on enemies for 10s. The wielder's initial SP + 30.0. Does not work in Open World.

skills.name: Key of Destruction
skills.description: In co-op raids, team attacks gain 18.0% Total DMG Multiplier and the team heals 7.0% HP for 5.1s whenever a character uses a weapon skill.
